vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jos.15.17;
son of: Kenaz (H7073I);
brother of: Seraiah (H8304J); married to Achsah (H5915);
father of: Hathath (H2867) and Meonothai (H4587)(?)
§ Othniel = "lion of God"
son of Kenaz, younger brother of Caleb, and husband of Achsah the daughter of Caleb and his own niece; first judge of Israel, who after the death of Joshua, delivered the Israelites from the oppression of Chushanrishathaim
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Quenaz; primer juez de Israel
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
俄陀聶 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "上帝的獅子"
基納斯之子, 迦勒之弟, 迦勒女兒之夫; 約書亞
去世後, 以色列的第一任士師, 解救以色列人脫離古珊利薩田的壓制
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
俄陀聂 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "上帝的狮子"
基纳斯之子, 迦勒之弟, 迦勒女儿之夫; 约书亚
去世后, 以色列的第一任士师, 解救以色列人脱离古珊利萨田的压制
